name: StaccatoQuart
description:
Staccato Quart is a digital version of the well-known paper game "Dots and Boxes" (also known as Dots),
but with a twist. The game is played in real time, with two players being able to move 4 times for every 1 second spurt.

3 words of inspiration

Staccato

Mass

Prolong

This project was concepted and developed during "MakeAThing", a 5 day,
40 hour game jam, hosted by Steve Halliwell and held at SAE Brisbane.

The Creators

Nic Lyness:

Designer, UI

Daniel Koitka:

Programmer
